

   <script>
    function videoResize(){
   if (jQuery(window).width() > 768) {
       jQuery(document).ready(function($){
           $(window).resize(function(){
             var height = $(this).height();
           $('.fullpage').height(height);
           });
           $(window).resize(); 
       });
     }
 }
 fZONE.ready(function(){
   $('#video-container').vide({
       'mp4': '/videos/Tuttle-Click-Auto-Group-Ford.mp4'
   }); 
   videoResize();  
   $('.seo article').each(function () {
     if ($('p', this).length > 1) $(this).append('<br><a href="javascript:void(0)" class="read-more">Read More +</a><a href="javascript:void(0)" class="read-less" style="display: none;">Read Less -</a>');
     $('p:gt(0)', this).hide();
     $('h2:gt(0)', this).hide();
     $('ul', this).hide();
     $('h1:gt(0)', this).hide();
     $(this).find("> span").hide();
     var paras = this;
     $('a.read-more', this).click(function () {
       $('p:gt(0)', paras).slideToggle();
       $('h2:gt(0)', paras).slideToggle();
       $('ul', paras).slideToggle();
       $('h1:gt(0)', paras).slideToggle();
       $(paras).find("> span").slideToggle();
       $(".read-less").show();
       $(".read-more").hide();
     });
     $('a.read-less', this).click(function () {
       $('p:gt(0)', paras).slideToggle();
       $('h2:gt(0)', paras).slideToggle();
       $('ul', paras).slideToggle();
       $('h1:gt(0)', paras).slideToggle();
       $(paras).find("> span").slideToggle();
       $(".read-less").hide();
       $(".read-more").show();
     });
   });
 });
   </script>

         <div class="large-7 columns header-hours">
          <div class="row">
           <div class="columns">
            <span style="display:inline-block;">
             Sales: Open Today! 9:00 AM - 8:00 PM
            </span>
            |
            <span style="display:inline-block;">
             Service: Open Today! 8:00 AM - 5:00 PMÂ  |
             <span class="text-right" style="display:inline-block;">

              <a href="javascript:void(0);" onclick="javascript:$('#loginModal').foundation('open');" style="color: white; font-weight: bold; font-size: 0.7rem;">
               Log In
              </a>
              |
              <a href="javascript:void(0);" onclick="javascript:$('#signupModal').foundation('open');" style="color: white; font-weight: bold; font-size: 0.7rem;">
               Sign Up

           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div itemscope="" itemtype="http://schema.org/AutoDealer">

      <div class="seo">
       <div class="row">
        <div class="large-12 columns seo-text">
         <div class="columns seo-text">
          <article>
           <h1>
            Ford Dealership Serving Mission Viejo and San Clemente Drivers â Capistrano Ford
           </h1>
           <h2>
            Ford Sales, Financing, Service, and Parts in San Juan Capistrano, CA
           </h2>
           <p>
            Searching for a new Ford car, SUV, or pickup truck near San Juan Capistrano, CA? If so, then you have come to the right dealership website! At Capistrano Ford, we specialize in providing San Juan Capistrano drivers and families with access to Ford's complete lineup of new vehicles at highly competitive prices. Ford has one of the largest and most comprehensive vehicle lineups of any automaker today, and all Ford models are well represented at our San Juan Capistrano dealership. Shop for your new Ford Fiesta, Focus, Fusion, Taurus, Escape, Edge, Explorer, F-150, or another model here on our website by browsing our
            <a href="/inventory?type=new" target="_blank">
             new Ford inventory in San Juan Capistrano
            </a>
            . Capistrano Ford proudly serves Mission Viejo and San Clemente drivers with new car and used auto financing, professional auto service, and genuine Ford parts and accessories.
           </p>
           <p>
            The Sales Department at Capistrano Ford features highly knowledgeable Ford sales specialists who are here on-site to assist local drivers and families in finding the perfect new Ford to call their own. Whether you have a certain Ford model and trim level in mind or you could use some guidance based on your budget and driving style, let our trained sales professionals introduce you to our selection of Ford cars, SUVs, and pickups. For a fuel-sipping new car, Capistrano Ford has got you covered with our inventory of Fiesta, Focus, Fusion, Fusion Hybrid, C-MAX Hybrid, and Escape models. These affordable and fuel-efficient Fords are also highly versatile! Speaking of versatile, Ford's latest Explorer SUV offers seating for up to seven passengers, along with a flexible cabin that can quickly convert to additional cargo space. Ford's six crossovers and SUVs -- namely the Escape, Edge, Transit Connect, Flex, Explorer, and Expedition -- are all here in stock in strong supply. For even greater capability, turn to Ford's legendary F-Series lineup of pickup trucks like the top-selling F-150 and the Super Duty models. Capistrano Ford also carries Ford's line of commercial trucks and vans, so no matter how big of a job you need your new vehicle to do, turn to Ford for the answer! Come and explore all that the latest Ford lineup has to offer here at Capistrano Ford in San Juan Capistrano, CA.
           </p>
           <p>
            New Ford vehicles are certainly known for their affordability and exceptional value, but car buyers who are on a tight budget can get into a quality vehicle for even less money when they shop the
            <a href="/inventory?type=used" target="_blank">
             used vehicle inventory
            </a>
            here at Capistrano Ford. We stock not only a large selection of pre-owned Fords, but also used cars, SUVs, minivans, and pickups from other popular automakers, too. We even offer an extensive collection of pristine, late-model, Certified Pre-owned Ford vehicles; these Fords have passed an intensive inspection by our Ford certified service technicians, and even receive an updated warranty. With low prices on new and used Ford vehicles, why shop anywhere else than Capistrano Ford when car shopping near San Juan Capistrano?
           </p>
           <p>
            Whether you have already found your dream car among our inventory of new Fords or you are still conducting your car search, you can
            <a href="/credit-application" target="_blank">
             get pre-approved for your auto loan in minutes
            </a>
            -- right here on our website. Our dedicated finance specialists are here to assist you with a hassle-free auto loan with low rates and monthly payments that fit into your budget.
           </p>
           <p>
            Remember, when your Ford vehicle needs an oil change, other routine maintenance, or repairs performed near San Juan Capistrano, take it to the Ford auto service experts here at the Capistrano Ford Service Center. Schedule your next service appointment online in moments, with our
            <a href="/schedule-service" target="_blank">
             schedule service form
            </a>
            .
           </p>
          </article>
          <div class="hide-for-large-up" style="padding:5px;">

   <script async="" src="/common/js/min/fzauto6.v3.min.js">
   </script>
   <script>
    var myType;
 var myYear;
 var myMake;
 var myModel;
 var curType;
 var curYear;
 var curMake;
 var curModel;
 var curDaysOnLot;
 var makesArray;
 var distance;
 var crd;
 var popDistance;
 var popRadius;
 var is_chrome = navigator.userAgent.indexOf('Chrome') > -1;
 var is_explorer = navigator.userAgent.indexOf('MSIE') > -1;
 var is_firefox = navigator.userAgent.indexOf('Firefox') > -1;
 var is_safari = navigator.userAgent.indexOf("Safari") > -1;
 var is_opera = navigator.userAgent.toLowerCase().indexOf("op") > -1;
 if ((is_chrome)&&(is_safari)) {is_safari=false;}
 if ((is_chrome)&&(is_opera)) {is_chrome=false;}
     
 var logCookie;
 		
 fZONE.ready(function(){
 	if(typeof $.cookie !== 'undefined')
 	{
 	logCookie = $.cookie('fzlogin');
 	geoCookie = $.cookie('fzLat');
 	getLocation();
 	}
 });
 
 function geosuccess(pos) {
   crd = pos.coords;
   $.cookie('fzLat',crd.latitude);
   $.cookie('fzLon',crd.longitude);
 };
 		
 function geoerror(err) {
   //console.warn('ERROR(' + err.code + '): ' + err.message);
 };
 
 function getLocation() {
 	var alreadySeen = $.cookie('alreadySeen');
 	if(typeof alreadySeen === 'undefined')
 	{
 		if (navigator.geolocation) {
 			var geooptions = {
 			  enableHighAccuracy: true,
 			  timeout: 5000,
 			  maximumAge: 0
 			};
 			
 			navigator.geolocation.getCurrentPosition(geosuccess, geoerror, geooptions);
 			
 			//console.log("Cookie Not Set!");
 		}
 		else
 		{
 		   //console.log("Cookie already set!");
 		   //console.log($.cookie('fzLat'));
 		   //console.log($.cookie('fzLon'));
 		}
 		$.cookie('alreadySeen','1');
 	}
 }
 
 function getDistance(lat1, lon1, lat2, lon2, unit) {
 		var radlat1 = Math.PI * lat1/180
         var radlat2 = Math.PI * lat2/180
         var radlon1 = Math.PI * lon1/180
         var radlon2 = Math.PI * lon2/180
         var theta = lon1-lon2
         var radtheta = Math.PI * theta/180
         var dist = Math.sin(radlat1) * Math.sin(radlat2) + Math.cos(radlat1) * Math.cos(radlat2) * Math.cos(radtheta);
         dist = Math.acos(dist)
         dist = dist * 180/Math.PI
         dist = dist * 60 * 1.1515
         if (unit=="K") { dist = dist * 1.609344 }
         if (unit=="N") { dist = dist * 0.8684 }
         return dist
 }
 
 function validateEmail(email) {
     var re = /^(([^<>()\[\]\.,;:\s@"]+(\.[^<>()\[\]\.,;:\s@"]+)*)|(".+"))@((\[[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}])|(([a-zA-Z\-0-9]+\.)+[a-zA-Z]{2,}))$/;
     return re.test(email);
 }
 		
 function accountSignUp()
 {
 	var checkFlag = 0;
 	var emailFlag = $(".signup-panel input[name='email']").val();
 	$(".signup-panel input").each(function(){
 		if($(this).val() == '')
 		{
 			checkFlag++;
 			$(this).css("border","1px solid red");
 		}
 		else
 		{
 			$(this).css("border","1px solid #cacaca");
 		}
 	});
 		
 	if(!validateEmail(emailFlag))
 		{
 			$(".signup-panel input[name='email']").css("border","1px solid red");
 		}
 		else
 		{
 			$(".signup-panel input[name='email']").css("border","1px solid #cacaca");
 		}
 		
 	if(checkFlag == 0 && validateEmail(emailFlag))
 	{	
 		$('#loadingModal').foundation('open');
 		$.ajax({
 		  url: "/common/include/createAccount.php?vin="+$('input.myVin').val()+"&siteid=265&email="+$(".signup-panel input[name='email']").val()+"&password="+$(".signup-panel input[name='password']").val()+"&fname="+$(".signup-panel input[name='fname']").val()+"&lname="+$(".signup-panel input[name='lname']").val()
 		}).done(function() {
 		  $.cookie('fzlogin',$(".signup-panel input[name='email']").val());
 		  setTimeout('closeLoader()',4000);
 		});
 	}
 }
 		  		
 function closeLoader()
 {
 	window.location.href = '/inventory?save=true';
 }
 		
 function addSave(vin)
 {
 	logCookie = $.cookie('fzlogin');
 	if(typeof logCookie !== 'undefined')
 	{
 		var des = $("#header-menu span.text-right").offset();
 		console.log(des);
 		des.top = des.top - 200;
 		if(is_safari)
 		{
 		des.top = -700;
 		$(".srp-vehicle #"+vin+" .srp-vehicle-media").css("position","relative");
 		}
 	    var el = $(".srp-vehicle #"+vin+" .srp-vehicle-media img");
 		el.clone().appendTo(".srp-vehicle #"+vin+" .srp-vehicle-media");
 		var el2 = $(".srp-vehicle #"+vin+" .srp-vehicle-media img:eq(1)");
 		var myWidth = el2.width();
 	    el2.css("position", "absolute").css("width",myWidth+"px").css("z-index","999999");
 	    
 	    if(is_safari)
 		{
 		    el2.animate({ top: des.top+"px" ,left :des.left+"px"}, 800, undefined, function () {
 		      el2.remove();
 		    });
 	    }
 	    else
 	    {
 	    	el2.animate({ top: des.top+"px" ,left :des.left+"px"}, 300, undefined, function () {
 		      el2.remove();
 		    });
 	    }
 	    
     
 		$.ajax({
 		  url: "/common/include/saveVehicle.php?vin="+vin+"&siteid=265&email="+logCookie
 		}).done(function() {
 		  $("#data-"+vin+" .saveBtn").html("<i class='fa fa-heart' style='color: red;'></i>Saved Vehicle");
 		  $("#data-"+vin+" .saveBtn").attr("href","javascript:removeSave('"+vin+"')"); 
 		});
 		
 		var blinkInterval;
 		$('a[href="/inventory?save=true"]').each(function() {
 		    var elem = $(this);
 		    blinkInterval = setInterval(function() {
 		        if (elem.css('visibility') == 'hidden') {
 		            elem.css('visibility', 'visible');
 		        } else {
 		            elem.css('visibility', 'hidden');
 		        }    
 		    }, 100);
 		});
 		setTimeout(function() 
 		{
 		    clearInterval(blinkInterval);
 		    $('a[href="/inventory?save=true"]').css('visibility','visible');
 		}, 1500);
 		
 	}
 	else
 	{
 		$('#loginModal').foundation('open');
 		$('input.myVin').val(vin);
 	}
 }
 		  		
 function removeSave(vin)
 {
 	logCookie = $.cookie('fzlogin');
 	if(typeof logCookie !== 'undefined')
 	{
 		$.ajax({
 		  url: "/common/include/saveVehicle.php?remove=true&vin="+vin+"&siteid=265&email="+logCookie
 		}).done(function() {
 		  $("#data-"+vin+" .saveBtn").html("<i class='fa fa-heart-o'></i>Save Vehicle");
 		  $("#data-"+vin+" .saveBtn").attr("href","javascript:addSave('"+vin+"')"); 
 		});
 	}
 	else
 	{
 		$('#loginModal').foundation('open');
 		$('input.myVin').val(vin);
 	}
 }
 		  		
 function logOut()
 {
   $.removeCookie('fzlogin');
   window.location.reload();
 }
 
 function login()
 {
 	var currentEmail = $("#loginModal input.email").val();
 	var currentPass = $("#loginModal input.password").val();
 	$.get('/common/include/login.php?email='+currentEmail+'&password='+currentPass, function(data) {
 		  	var saveData = data;
 		  	if(saveData == 'success')
 		  		{
 		  			$.cookie('fzlogin',currentEmail);
 		  			window.location.reload();
 		  		}
 		  		else
 		  		{
 		  			var div = $("#loginModal");
 		  			shake(div);
 		  		}
 	});
 }
 
 function shake(div){                                                                                                                                                                                            
     var interval = 100;                                                                                                 
     var distance = 10;                                                                                                  
     var times = 4;                                                                                                      
 
     $(div).css('position','relative');                                                                                  
 
     for(var iter=0;iter<(times+1);iter++){                                                                              
         $(div).animate({ 
             left:((iter%2==0 ? distance : distance*-1))
             },interval);                                   
     }//for                                                                                                              
 
     $(div).animate({ left: 0},interval);                                                                                
 
 }
 		
 function addWatch(vin)
 {
 	logCookie = $.cookie('fzlogin');
 	if(typeof logCookie !== 'undefined')
 	{
 		alert("You are logged in!");
 	}
 	else
 	{
 		$('#loginModal').foundation('open');
 	}
 }
 		
 function addCompare(vin)
 {
 	var currentCompare = $.cookie('fzcompare');
 	if(typeof currentCompare !== 'undefined')
 	{
 		if(currentCompare.split("|").length > 2)
 		{
 			$(".alert-panel-error").show().delay(1200).fadeOut(200);
 		}
 		else
 		{	
 			$("#data-"+vin+" a.compareBtn").attr("href","javascript:removeCompare('"+vin+"');");
 			$("#data-"+vin+" a.compareBtn").html('<i class="fa fa-check-square-o"></i> Remove');
 			$(".alert-panel-add").show().delay(1200).fadeOut(200);
 			$(".alert-panel .compareLink a").text("Compare " + (currentCompare.split("|").length + 1) + " Vehicle(s)");
 			$.cookie('fzcompare', currentCompare + "|" + vin);
 			$(".compareLink a").attr("href","/inventory?view=grid&compare=true&vins="+$.cookie('fzcompare'));
 		}
 	}
 	else
 	{
 		$("#data-"+vin+" a.compareBtn").attr("href","javascript:removeCompare('"+vin+"');");
 		$("#data-"+vin+" a.compareBtn").html('<i class="fa fa-check-square-o"></i> Remove');
 		$(".alert-panel .compareLink a").text("Compare 1 Vehicle(s)");
 		$(".alert-panel").show();
 		$.cookie('fzcompare', vin);
 		$(".compareLink a").attr("href","/inventory?view=grid&compare=true&vins="+$.cookie('fzcompare'));
 	}
 		  		
 	var des = $(".alert-panel").offset();
 	des.top = des.top - 100;
     var el = $(".srp-vehicle #"+vin+" .srp-vehicle-media img");
 	el.clone().appendTo(".srp-vehicle #"+vin+" .srp-vehicle-media");
 	var el2 = $(".srp-vehicle #"+vin+" .srp-vehicle-media img:eq(1)");
 	var myWidth = el2.width();
     el2.css("position", "absolute").css("width",myWidth+"px").css("z-index","999999");
     el2.animate({ top: des.top+"px" ,left :des.left+"px"}, 300, undefined, function () {
       el2.remove().appendTo(".comparePanel").css("position", "static");
     });
 		
 	//console.log($.cookie('fzcompare'));
 }
 		
 function removeCompare(vin)
 {
 	var newCompare = "";
 	var currentCompare = $.cookie('fzcompare');
 	if(typeof currentCompare !== 'undefined')
 	{
 		if(currentCompare.split("|").length > 0)
 		{
 			var compareArray = currentCompare.split("|");
 			var index = compareArray.indexOf(vin);
 			if (index > -1) {
     			compareArray.splice(index, 1);
 			}
 			if(compareArray.length > 0)
 			{
 				for(var i=0;i<=compareArray.length - 1;i++)
 				{
 					newCompare += compareArray[i];
 					if(i < compareArray.length - 1)
 					{
 						newCompare += "|";
 					}
 				}
 				if(newCompare == '' || newCompare == "|")
 				{
 					$.removeCookie('fzcompare');
 				}
 				else
 				{
 					$.cookie('fzcompare', newCompare);
 				}
 			}
 			else
 			{
 				$.removeCookie('fzcompare');
 			}
 		}
 		else
 		{
 			$.removeCookie('fzcompare');
 		}
 	}
 		
 	currentCompare = $.cookie('fzcompare');
 	$(".compareBtn").attr("href","javascript:removeCompare('"+vin+"');");
 		  		
 	$("#data-"+vin+" a.compareBtn").attr("href","javascript:addCompare('"+vin+"');");
 	$("#data-"+vin+" a.compareBtn").html('<i class="fa fa-check-square-o"></i> Compare');
 	$("#data-"+vin+" a.compareBtn").parent().parent().parent().parent().parent().remove();
 	$(".alert-panel").hide();
 	$(".srp-selected").hide();
 		  		
 	
 	if(typeof currentCompare !== 'undefined')
 	{
 		if(currentCompare.split("|").length >= 0)
 		{
 			$(".alert-panel-remove").show().delay(1200).fadeOut(200);
 			$(".alert-panel .compareLink a").text("Compare " + (currentCompare.split("|").length) + " Vehicle(s)");
 			$(".compareLink a").attr("href","/inventory?view=grid&compare=true&vins="+$.cookie('fzcompare'));
 		}
 		else
 		{
 			$(".alert-panel").hide();
 		}
 	}
 	else
 	{
 		$(".alert-panel").hide();
 	}
 		
 	//console.log($.cookie('fzcompare'));
 }
 		
 function switchView(n)
 {
 	if(n == 'grid')
 	{
 		$(".srp-vehicle").removeClass("row");
 		$(".srp-vehicle").addClass("medium-4");
 		$(".srp-vehicle").addClass("columns");
 		$(".srp-vehicle").css("border","1px dotted #ddd");
 		$(".srp-vehicle").css("padding","10px 0.9375rem");
 		$(".srp-vehicle").css("box-shadow","none");
 		$(".srp-vehicle-title").css("min-height","57px");
 		$(".srp-vehicle > div").removeClass("columns");
 		$(".srp-vehicle-list-data > div").removeClass();
 		$(".srp-vehicle-list-data > div").addClass("medium-12").addClass("columns");
 		$(".srp-vehicle-list-data .medium-3").removeClass("medium-3").addClass("medium-12").addClass("columns");
 		$(".srp-vehicle-list-data .medium-9").removeClass("medium-9").addClass("medium-12").addClass("columns");
 		$(".srp-vehicle-list-data .medium-8").removeClass().addClass("medium-12").addClass("columns");
 		$(".srp-vehicle-list-data .medium-4").removeClass().addClass("medium-12").addClass("columns");
 		$(".srp-vehicle-list-data .medium-12").removeClass().addClass("medium-12").addClass("columns");
 		$(".srp-vehicle-data").hide();
 		/*$(".srp span:contains('Stock:')").each(function(){ 
 		  			var myStock = $(this).parent().html();
 		  			$(this).closest(".srp-vehicle").find(".viewsBtn").before("<b>"+myStock+"</b>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;");
 		  		});
 		 */
 	}
 	/*
 	if(n == 'list')
 	{
 		$(".srp-vehicle").addClass("row");
 		$(".srp-vehicle").removeClass("medium-4");
 		$(".srp-vehicle").removeClass("columns");
 		$(".srp-vehicle").css("border-top",".0625rem dashed #424242");
 		$(".srp-vehicle").css("border-bottom","0");
 		$(".srp-vehicle").css("border-left","0");
 		$(".srp-vehicle").css("border-right","0");
 		$(".srp-vehicle").css("padding","0");
 		$(".srp-vehicle-title").css("min-height","auto");
 		$(".srp-vehicle > div").addClass("columns");
 		$(".srp-vehicle-list-data > div").removeClass();
 		$(".srp-vehicle-list-data > div:nth-child(1)").addClass("medium-3");
 		$(".srp-vehicle-list-data > div:nth-child(1)").addClass("columns");
 		$(".srp-vehicle-list-data > div:nth-child(2)").addClass("medium-3");
 		$(".srp-vehicle-list-data > div:nth-child(2)").addClass("medium-push-6");
 		$(".srp-vehicle-list-data > div:nth-child(2)").addClass("columns");
 		$(".srp-vehicle-list-data > div:nth-child(3)").addClass("medium-pull-3");
 		$(".srp-vehicle-list-data > div:nth-child(3)").addClass("medium-6");
 		$(".srp-vehicle-list-data > div:nth-child(3)").addClass("columns");
 		$(".srp-vehicle .medium-12 .medium-12").removeClass("text-center");
 		$(".srp-vehicle-data").show();
 	}
 	*/
 }
 
 function setGetParameter(paramName, paramValue)
 {
     var url = window.location.href;
     var hash = location.hash;
     url = url.replace(hash, '');
     if (url.indexOf(paramName + "=") >= 0)
     {
         var prefix = url.substring(0, url.indexOf(paramName));
         var suffix = url.substring(url.indexOf(paramName));
         suffix = suffix.substring(suffix.indexOf("=") + 1);
         suffix = (suffix.indexOf("&") >= 0) ? suffix.substring(suffix.indexOf("&")) : "";
         url = prefix + paramName + "=" + paramValue + suffix;
     }
     else
     {
     if (url.indexOf("?") < 0)
         url += "?" + paramName + "=" + paramValue;
     else
         url += "&" + paramName + "=" + paramValue;
     }
     window.location.href = url + hash;
 }
 
 var getUrlParameter = function getUrlParameter(sParam) {
     var sPageURL = decodeURIComponent(window.location.search.substring(1)),
         sURLVariables = sPageURL.split('&'),
         sParameterName,
         i;
 
     for (i = 0; i < sURLVariables.length; i++) {
         sParameterName = sURLVariables[i].split('=');
 
         if (sParameterName[0] === sParam) {
             return sParameterName[1] === undefined ? true : sParameterName[1];
         }
     }
 };
 		  		
 var compareArray;
 var saveData;
 var saveArray;
 
 		  		
 fZONE.ready(function(){
 	
 	
 	var viewParam = getUrlParameter('view');
 	if(typeof viewParam !== 'undefined')
 	{
 		switchView(viewParam);
 	}
 		  		
 	
 		
 	var compareParam = getUrlParameter('compare');
 	if(typeof compareParam !== 'undefined')
 	{
 		$(".srp .large-3").hide();
 		$(".srp .large-9").removeClass("large-9").addClass("large-12");
 		$(".srp-vehicle-data").removeClass("medium-up-2").addClass("medium-up-1");
 		$(".srp-vehicle-data").show();
 		$("img[alt*='Best']").hide();
 		$(".srp .medium-4:last").addClass("end");
 	}
 		  		
 	if(jQuery.cookie)
 	{
 		var currentCompare = $.cookie('fzcompare');
 		if(typeof currentCompare !== 'undefined')
 		{
 			compareArray = currentCompare.split("|");
 		  	//console.log(compareArray);
 			for(var i=0;i<compareArray.length; i++)
 			{
 		  		//console.log(i);
 				$("#data-"+compareArray[0]+" a.compareBtn").attr("href","javascript:removeCompare('"+compareArray[0]+"');");
 				$("#data-"+compareArray[0]+" a.compareBtn").html('<i class="fa fa-check-square-o"></i> Remove');
 			}
 			
 			$(".alert-panel .compareLink a").text("Compare " + (currentCompare.split("|").length) + " Vehicle(s)");
 			$(".compareLink a").attr("href","/inventory?view=grid&compare=true&vins="+$.cookie('fzcompare'));
 			$(".alert-panel").fadeIn();
 		}
 	}	  		
 	
 		  		
 	 if(jQuery.cookie)
 	{ 		
 		var currentSave = $.cookie('fzlogin');
 		if(typeof currentSave !== 'undefined') 
 		{
 			$.get('/common/include/getVehicles.php?email='+currentSave, function(data) {
 			  	saveData = data;
 			  	saveArray = saveData.split("|");
 				for(var i=0;i<=saveArray.length - 1; i++)
 				{
 				  	$("#data-"+saveArray[i]+" .saveBtn").html("<i class='fa fa-heart' style='color: red;'></i>Saved Vehicle");
 				  	$("#data-"+saveArray[i]+" .saveBtn").attr("href","javascript:removeSave('"+saveArray[i]+"')"); 
 				}
 			});
 		}
 
 	 } 		
 	makesArray = new Array();
 	$.ajax({
 	   url:'/raw-research-model-list',
 	   type:'GET',
 	   success: function(data){
 		  var json_obj = $.parseJSON(data);
 		  if(json_obj.length > 0)
 		  {
 	          var previousMake;
 	          var currentMake;
 	          for (var i in json_obj) 
 	          {
 	            currentMake = json_obj[i].make;
 	            if(previousMake == currentMake)
 	            {
 	            	//console.log("Still Same");
 	            }
 	            else
 	            {
 	            	//console.log("Changed");
 	            	makesArray.push(currentMake);
 	            }
 	            previousMake = json_obj[i].make
 	          }
 	       if(makesArray.length > 1)
 	       {
 	       	  var output='<ul style="width: 200px;" class="researchUL dropdown menu submenu is-dropdown-submenu first-sub vertical" data-submenu="" aria-hidden="true" role="menu">';
 		  	  var outputMobile='<ul style="width: 200px;" class="submenu is-accordion-submenu" data-submenu="" aria-hidden="true" role="tabpanel">';
 	          for(var x=0;x<makesArray.length;x++)
 	          {
 	          	  output += '<li class="is-dropdown-submenu-parent opens-right" role="menuitem" aria-haspopup="true" aria-expanded="false" aria-label="'+makesArray[x]+' Research" data-is-click="false"><a href="/research-model?make='+makesArray[x]+'">'+makesArray[x]+' Research</a><ul style="width: 350px;" class="dropdown menu submenu is-dropdown-submenu first-sub vertical" data-submenu="" aria-hidden="true" role="menu">';
 	          	  outputMobile += '<li class="is-accordion-submenu-parent is-submenu-item is-accordion-submenu-item" role="tab"><a href="/research-model?make='+makesArray[x]+'">'+makesArray[x]+' Research</a><ul class="submenu is-accordion-submenu is-active" data-submenu="" aria-hidden="true" role="tabpanel">';
 		  		  for (var i in json_obj) 
 		          {
 		          	 if(makesArray[x] == json_obj[i].make)
 		          	 {
 		             output+="<li><a href='/research-video?year="+json_obj[i].year+"&make="+json_obj[i].make+"&model="+json_obj[i].model+"'><img src='" + json_obj[i].image + "'>&nbsp;" + json_obj[i].make + " " + json_obj[i].model + "</a></li>";
 		  			 outputMobile+="<li role='menuitem' class='is-submenu-item is-accordion-submenu-item'><a href='/research-video?year="+json_obj[i].year+"&make="+json_obj[i].make+"&model="+json_obj[i].model+"'>" + json_obj[i].make + " " + json_obj[i].model + "</a></li>";
 		             }
 		          }
 		          output += "</ul></li>";
 		  		  outputMobile += "</ul></li>";
 	          }
 	          output+="</ul>";
 		  	  outputMobile+="</ul>";
 	          $(".header li[aria-label='Research'] > ul > li:last").after(output);
 		  	  $("#offCanvasLeft li a:contains('Research') + ul > li:last").after(outputMobile);
 			  $(".header li").not('.is-dropdown-submenu-parent').has("a:contains('Research')").replaceWith('<li class="modelListItem is-dropdown-submenu-parent opens-right" role="menuitem" aria-haspopup="true" aria-expanded="false" aria-label="Research"><a href="/research-model">Research</a>'+output).foundation();
 			  $("#offCanvasLeft li").not('.is-accordion-submenu-parent').has("a:contains('Research')").replaceWith('<li class="is-submenu-item is-accordion-submenu-item is-accordion-submenu-parent" role="menuitem"><a href="/research-model">Research</a>'+outputMobile).foundation();
 		  	  Foundation.reInit($('.dropdown'));
 		  	  Foundation.reInit($('#offCanvasLeft > ul.vertical'));
 		  	  if($(".modelListItem ul li ul li").length > 10)
 		  		{
 		  			$(".researchUL ul").removeAttr("style");
 		  			$(".researchUL ul").css("width","568px");
 		  			$(".researchUL li ul li").css("width","50%").css("float","left");
 		  		}
 	       }
 	       else
 	       {
 	       	  var output='<ul style="width: 315px;" class="researchUL dropdown menu submenu is-dropdown-submenu first-sub vertical" data-submenu="" aria-hidden="true" role="menu">';
 	       	  var outputMobile='<ul class="submenu is-accordion-submenu" data-submenu="" role="tabpanel">';
 	          for (var i in json_obj) 
 	          {
 		  		
 		  		//if(json_obj[i].vif !== null)
 		  		//{
 	             output+="<li><a href='/research-video?year="+json_obj[i].year+"&make="+json_obj[i].make+"&model="+json_obj[i].model+"'>" + json_obj[i].make + " " + json_obj[i].model + "</a></li>";
 	             outputMobile+="<li><a href='/research-video?year="+json_obj[i].year+"&make="+json_obj[i].make+"&model="+json_obj[i].model+"'>" + json_obj[i].make + " " + json_obj[i].model + "</a></li>";
 	          	//}
 		  		
 			  }
 	          output+="</ul>";
 	          outputMobile+="</ul>";
 	          $(".header li[aria-label='Research'] > ul > li:last").after('<li class="modelListItem is-dropdown-submenu-parent opens-right" role="menuitem" aria-haspopup="true" aria-expanded="false" aria-label="Model Research" data-is-click="false"><a href="/research-model">Model Research</a>' + output);
 	          $("#offCanvasLeft li a:contains('Research') + ul > li:last").after('<li class="is-accordion-submenu-parent is-submenu-item is-accordion-submenu-item" role="tab"><a href="/research-model">Model Research</a>' + outputMobile);
 			  $(".header li").not('.is-dropdown-submenu-parent').has("a:contains('Research')").replaceWith('<li class="modelListItem is-dropdown-submenu-parent opens-right" role="menuitem" aria-haspopup="true" aria-expanded="false" aria-label="Research"><a href="#">Research</a><ul class="dropdown menu submenu is-dropdown-submenu first-sub vertical" data-submenu="" aria-hidden="true" role="menu"><li class="modelListItem is-dropdown-submenu-parent opens-right" role="menuitem" aria-haspopup="true" aria-expanded="false" aria-label="Model Research" data-is-click="false"><a href="/research-model">Model Research</a>'+output+'</li></ul>').foundation();
 			  $("#offCanvasLeft li").not('.is-accordion-submenu-parent').has("a:contains('Research')").replaceWith('<li class="is-accordion-submenu-parent is-submenu-item is-accordion-submenu-item" role="tab"><a href="#">Research</a><ul class="submenu is-accordion-submenu" data-submenu="" role="tabpanel"><li class="is-accordion-submenu-parent is-submenu-item is-accordion-submenu-item" role="menuitem"><a href="/research-model">Model Research</a>'+outputMobile+'</li></ul>').foundation();
 			  Foundation.reInit($('.dropdown'));
 			  Foundation.reInit($('#offCanvasLeft > ul.vertical'));
 		  	  if($(".modelListItem ul li").length > 10)
 		  		{
 		  			$(".researchUL").removeAttr("style");
 		  			$(".researchUL").css("width","568px");
 		  			$(".researchUL li").css("width","50%").css("float","left");
 		  		}
 	       }
 		  }
 		}
 	});
 			
 		  		
 });
   </script>
   <script>
    fZONE.ready(function(){
 		$(document).ajaxComplete(function(){
 			if($(".bestprice textarea").length <= 0)
 			{
 				$(".bestprice input[name='customer_phone']").closest("div").after("<div class='columns bpComment'><label>Comments: <textarea name='comments' width='100%' style='width: 100%; height: 75px;'></textarea></label></div>");
 			}		});
 	});
 fZONE.ready(function(){
 		
 	$(".bad span.label").text("Poor");
 		
 	$("button.menu-icon").text("Menu");
 		
 	setTimeout('fzClarivoy()',3000);
 	//carFaxThanks();
 		
 		 //$(".aa:contains('Dart')").remove(); 
 		
 		$("#header-menu ul.dropdown a[href*='http://owners.honda.com/']").each(function(){
 				var myRecallText = $(this).attr("href");
 				var myUpdatedText = myRecallText.replace("owners.honda.com/","owners.honda.com/service-");
 				//$(this).attr("href",myUpdatedText);
 		});
 		
 		
 		
 	//AutoHook Installation
 	if(typeof autohookClient !== 'undefined')
 	{
 		// SRP FOOTER
 			if($(".srp").length > 0)
 			{
 			var getUrlParameter = function getUrlParameter(sParam) {
 			    var sPageURL = decodeURIComponent(window.location.search.substring(1)),
 			        sURLVariables = sPageURL.split('&'),
 			        sParameterName,
 			        i;
 			
 			    for (i = 0; i < sURLVariables.length; i++) {
 			        sParameterName = sURLVariables[i].split('=');
 			
 			        if (sParameterName[0] === sParam) {
 			            return sParameterName[1] === undefined ? true : sParameterName[1];
 			        }
 			    }
 			};
 			myType = getUrlParameter('type');
 			myYear = getUrlParameter('year');
 			myMake = getUrlParameter('make');
 			myModel = getUrlParameter('model');
 		
 			if(typeof myType == 'undefined'){myType = '';myType = myType.toString();}
 			if(typeof myYear == 'undefined'){myYear = '';myYear = myYear.toString();}
 			if(typeof myMake == 'undefined'){myMake = '';myMake = myMake.toString();}
 			if(typeof myModel == 'undefined'){myModel = '';myModel = myModel.toString();}
 		
 			if (myType == '') {
 				if (window.location.href.indexOf("new-") > -1) {
 					myType = "new";
 				} else if (window.location.href.indexOf("used-") > -1) {
 					myType = "used";
 				}
 			}
 		
 			var hl_protocol = (("https:" == document.location.protocol) ? "https://" : "http://");
 			var hl_script = document.createElement("script");
 			hl_script.src = hl_protocol + 'www.incentivesnetwork.net/Delivery/ClientPaths/'+autohookClient+'/Delivery.aspx?SiteID='+autohookSiteID+'&PgID='+myType+'_inventory&year='+myYear+'&make='+myMake+'&model='+myModel;
 			//console.log(hl_script.src);
 			hl_script.type = 'text/javascript';
 			hl_script.id = "HL_ScriptCall";
 			document.getElementsByTagName('head')[0].appendChild(hl_script);
 		
 			}
 		
 		// VDP FOOTER
 			if($(".vdp").length > 0)
 			{
 				if(window.location.href.indexOf("details") > -1)
 				{
 					if($(".vdp").hasClass("New"))
 					{
 						var curType = "new";
 					}
 					else
 					{
 						var curType = "used";
 					}
 					curName = $.trim($(".vehicle-title h1").text()); 
 					curName = curName.split(" ");
 					curYear = curName[0];
 					curMake = curName[1];
 					curModel = curName[2];
 					curDaysOnLot = $(".daysonlot").text();
 		
 					if(typeof curType == 'undefined'){curType = ''; curType = curType.toString();}
 					if(typeof curYear == 'undefined'){curYear = ''; curYear = curYear.toString();}
 					if(typeof curMake == 'undefined'){curMake = ''; curMake = curMake.toString();}
 					if(typeof curModel == 'undefined'){curModel = ''; curModel = curModel.toString();}
 				}
 			
 				var hl_protocol = (("https:" == document.location.protocol) ? "https://" : "http://");
 				var hl_script = document.createElement("script");
 				hl_script.src = hl_protocol + 'www.incentivesnetwork.net/Delivery/ClientPaths/'+autohookClient+'/Delivery.aspx?SiteID='+autohookSiteID+'&PgID='+curType+'_details&year='+curYear+'&make='+curMake+'&model='+curModel+'&daysonlot='+curDaysOnLot;
 				//console.log(hl_script.src);
 				hl_script.type = 'text/javascript';
 				hl_script.id = "HL_ScriptCall";
 				document.getElementsByTagName('head')[0].appendChild(hl_script);
 				
 			}
 		//Value Your Trade Page
 			if($(".value-your-trade").length > 0) {
 				var hl_protocol = (("https:" == document.location.protocol) ? "https://" : "http://");
 				var hl_script = document.createElement("script");
 				hl_script.src = hl_protocol + 'www.incentivesnetwork.net/Delivery/ClientPaths/'+autohookClient+'/Delivery.aspx?SiteID='+autohookSiteID+'&PgID=value_your_trade';
 				//console.log(hl_script.src);
 				hl_script.type = 'text/javascript';
 				hl_script.id = "HL_ScriptCall";
 				document.getElementsByTagName('head')[0].appendChild(hl_script);				
 			}		
 		
 		//Sell Your Car Page
 			if($(".sell-your-car").length > 0) {
 				var hl_protocol = (("https:" == document.location.protocol) ? "https://" : "http://");
 				var hl_script = document.createElement("script");
 				hl_script.src = hl_protocol + 'www.incentivesnetwork.net/Delivery/ClientPaths/'+autohookClient+'/Delivery.aspx?SiteID='+autohookSiteID+'&PgID=sell_your_car';
 				//console.log(hl_script.src);
 				hl_script.type = 'text/javascript';
 				hl_script.id = "HL_ScriptCall";
 				document.getElementsByTagName('head')[0].appendChild(hl_script);						
 			}			
 	}
 });
 		
 function fzClarivoy()
 {
 if(typeof $.cookie !== 'undefined')
 {
 	if(typeof $.cookie('_td') !== 'undefined')
 	{
 		$("form").append("<input name='clarivoy_id' type='hidden' value='"+$.cookie('_td')+"'>");
 	}
 }
 }
 		
 function carFaxThanks()
 {
 	if(typeof carFaxSwap === 'undefined')
 	{
 	$("a[href*='DisplayHistory']").each(function(){
 		var thisCarFaxLink = $(this).attr('href');
 		var thisCarFaxVIN = thisCarFaxLink.split("VIN=");
 		thisCarFaxVIN = thisCarFaxVIN[1];
 		$(this).attr('href','/get-carfax?vin='+thisCarFaxVIN);
 		$(this).removeAttr('target');
 	});
 	if(window.location.pathname == '/thank-you' && window.location.search.indexOf("CARFAX") !== -1 && window.location.search.split("vin=").length > 1)
 	{
 		var myVIN = window.location.search.split("vin=");
 		myVIN = myVIN[1];
 		$("h1:contains('Thank')").closest(".columns").html('<h1>Thank you</h1><p>Your form has been submitted successfully. Use the button below to download your CARFAX report.</p><p><a class="button large" href="https://www.carfax.com/VehicleHistory/p/Report.cfx?vin='+myVIN+'&partner=WDB_0" target="_blank">Download CARFAX Report</a></p>');
 	}
 	}
 }

 		//logo image script
 		$('<a href="https://www.fzautomotive.com/" target="_blank"><img alt="FusionZone Logo" src="https://s3.amazonaws.com/fzautomotive/dealers/5adfa5adddec3.png" style="width: 15%;"></a>').prependTo('div.copyright-fzauto');
 		//company name change from inc. to LLC.
 		$('.footer .copyright .row .columns.copyright-fzauto.text-center div:contains("Â© 2018 fusionZONE Automotive, Inc.")').text('Â© 2018 fusionZONE Automotive, LLC.');

 	}
